sentences.sContent: The salesman tried to palm us off with some shopsoiled sheets.
sentences.sContent_eng: The salesman tried to palm us off with some shopsoiled sheets.
sentences.sCn: 售货员设法用商店陈列过的旧床单来哄骗我们。

trans.tranCn: 陈列[搁置]久了的，陈旧的
trans.tranOther: worn, faded, tarnished, etc, from being displayed in a shop or store
